name: Super Red Rope Hanging
description:
Super Red Rope Hanging is an arcade game where you have to keep your ball alive by hanging with an elastic red rope. Inspired as a small spinoff of my previous game Super Red Rope Puzzles (https://kurnic.itch.io/super-red-rope-puzzles)

Simple game developed in raylib and prepared to be compiled in WebAssembly to be playable on internet browsers. Developed as a quick challenge due to the #raylib5kgamejam (https://itch.io/jam/raylib-5k-gamejam)

The game has only been tested on Mozilla Firefox and on Windows.

Feel free to comment your high-score!
